properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Up Calvary's mountain one dreadful mortn
Walked Christ my Savior weary and worn
Facing for sinnert death on the cross
That hHe might save them from endless loss

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Blessed Redeemer precious Redeemer
Seems now I see Him on Calvary's RTree
Wouded and bvleeding for sinners pleading
Blind an unheeding dying for me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
"Father forgiver them" thus did He pray
E'en while His life-blood flowed fast away
Praying for sinners while in such woe
No one but Jesus ever loved us so

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O how I love Him
Savior and Friend
How can my praises ever find end
Through years unnumbered on heaven's shore
My tounge shall praise Him forevermore
